p: The sequence data was analyzed through CLC Genomics Workbench version 11 software (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany). Homologous sequences from phleboviruses were aligned with homologous sequences of interest using Clustal W in Molecular Evolutionary Genetics Analysis 6 (MEGA6) software [ 20]. The evolutionary history was inferred by the neighborâ€“joining (NJ) method using the Kimura 2-parameter model with 1000 bootstrap replication.
